name: Smokey
excerpt:
An enticing web app, showcases my prowess in React, React Router, and Tailwind. Serving as an ecommerce hub for delectable hamburgers, Smokey combines seamless navigation, dynamic components, and captivating design for a delightful culinary experience.

Through Smokey's integration of React and React Router, users traverse a flavorful assortment of hamburger offerings. Tailwind CSS enhances the visual appeal, making Smokey a tantalizing blend of technology and gastronomy in the digital realm.

name: Paolo Montemaggi
excerpt:
Marrying design finesse and technical prowess, I shaped Paolo Montemaggi's medic-focused website. Seamlessly melding an alluring WordPress interface with bespoke plugins, I transformed the platform into an immersive digital haven.

Paolo Montemaggi's medic-oriented website emerged as a symphony of aesthetics and practicality. The infusion of Google Maps API not only enhanced user interaction but also underscored the prowess of insightful design and innovative thinking.

name: AiGap
excerpt:
Navigating AiGap's digital domain, I ventured into the STEM landscape, weaving a bespoke WordPress plugin to captivate users with event interactions. My tailored solution enkindled dynamic learning, nurturing an enriched ambiance. Empowered by WordPress, AiGap's platform flourished, nurturing an interactive STEM realm.

The custom plugin's charm extended beyond engagement, spotlighting pioneering approaches that invigorate women's journey through science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.

name: European Health and Law Technologies
excerpt:
Partnering with the University of Pisa, I was integral to the European Health and Law Technologies initiative. My multifaceted involvement encompassed adeptly managing social platforms, crafting custom WordPress plugins, and designing visually appealing flyers.

This holistic approach fortified the project's presence and functionality, ensuring impactful engagement within the intersections of health and law, while exemplifying the potential of versatile collaboration.

name: Bru Zane
excerpt:
I dedicated three months to refining the Holocron company's website, employing my expertise in WordPress, PHP, and Ajax. By skillfully troubleshooting bugs,

Bru Zane's website attained enhanced performance and interactivity. My adept utilization of WordPress, PHP, and Ajax rectified issues, exemplifying how technical proficiency can elevate a digital platform, fostering a more engaging and efficient user interaction.

others.name: GridLab
others.description: Developed a cutting-edge Max MSP Ableton plugin that transforms video to audio through black-white contrast analysis. This innovative tool utilizes MIDI-mappable grids to translate visual variations into immersive auditory experiences.

others.name: Weather App
others.description: Crafted an intuitive weather app that provides real-time forecasts with precision. Combining design and functionality, the app offers users accurate weather data and a seamless user experience.

others.name: Figma Style Extractor
others.description: Designed a Figma plugin extractor that effortlessly retrieves font and color data from projects. Empowering designers with efficient workflow, this tool simplifies the extraction process, enhancing creative insights and productivity.
